We’re open every day of the year.","icon_image":5,"order":null}],"style":"style3"},"component":"RegularBlock","open":true,"is_container":false},{"type":"video_player","name":"Video Player","model":{"title":"Share the beauty of your city","youtube":"","bg_image":174},"component":"RegularBlock","open":true,"is_container":false},{"type":"text","name":"Text","model":{"content":"

Crowdroom Fees Explained 

Platform Service Fees

Crowdroom charges guests/users a platform service fee $ 0.8 cents (“Platform Fee”). This helps us cover the costs of running our Platform, including providing Email and direct SMS Notifications regarding your bookings as well as completing and processing your transaction and providing 24/7 support for your bookings and all services added. 

Listee Fees (Commisions From Profit)

We charge Listees (Host Partners & Vendors) a commission (“Listee Fee”), which is retained by Crowdroom from their’s payout. The Listee Fee is typically, 3% of the listee's profit. This fee will be deducted from the listee's total profit once he/she requests for a payout.

Once a Listee logs a payout request, Crowdroom will normally initiate the payout within 1 to 3 days after a Booking is completed. To keep things fair, We may withhold a payout if a dispute is initiated between a User/Guest and a Listee (Host Partner or Vendor), or as otherwise permitted by the Services Agreement. Timing of a payout may also be modified where the Booking is updated, rescheduled, or cancelled.

Cancellations.

All Fees are subject to our Cancellation and Refund Policy.

","class":"text-center"},"component":"RegularBlock","open":true,"is_container":false},{"type":"faqs","name":"FAQ List","model":{"title":"Common Questions","list_item":[{"_active":false,"title":"How will I receive my payment?","sub_title":"

You can see your earnings live on your dashboard, you can see what you earn each day, each week etc. This Money remains on the dashboard until you request to Cash Out.  When Ever You want to Cash Out, You Just need to Click on the "payout" button. Your Money will be sent to the Payment Gateway You Added (Paypal or Wechat pay, or Alipay or Bank Account).

"},{"_active":false,"title":"How do I Submit Listings?","sub_title":"

After Applying To Join The LE Program, your application will be verified. Once approved you will have access to your dashboard. On your dashboard you will have access to all tools needed to create and manage your Group Tour or Event, as well as list Event Spaces or Resorts

"},{"_active":false,"title":"How does Crowdroom Make Money","sub_title":"

We collect a 3% fee from the profit you make from bookings made on Crowdroom, so we only make money when you do. It’s free to list your Activity(Group Tour / Event) or Event Space.

"},{"_active":false,"title":"How do I Get More Bookings?","sub_title":"

To Get More Bookings, You need to promote your listings either verbally or digitally (social media)  get in touch with friends let them know what you do, share links with them and this will help you. You can also tell your customers to leave reviews on your listings to i9mprove customer confidence

"}]},"component":"RegularBlock","open":true,"is_container":false}]
